Literal billions of dollars & 1000s of hours were spent sane-washing Trump/Rs while falsely demonizing his opponents

talk.utter: True. But it is their choice, made consciously. And every conversation I have with such a person reinforces that it was their choice, they made it, and they have no intention of being better. Which is also their choice.
